description: Exactly who the Shadow might be- or who he once was- is the subject of some grim speculation by Taro Kondo and Wong, but the answer may be closer than either suspects. Meanwhile, and Margo come face to face with the full horror of the Japanese occupation... and on the River Yangtze, a deadly ambush awaits the unwary.
name: The Fire of Creation, Part 4

description: The waters of Mongo run red with blood as Ming's feud with the Sharkmen threatens to spill over into all-out war! But even as new alliances are forged to pave the way for Ming's utter supremacy, the merciless Prince of Mongo suffers a personal loss that threatens to rip a giant black hole in his already dark heart!

As Anput unleashes unparalleled destruction upon New York, The Spider will knock down any door and bust any head to learn his enemy's secrets, but his investigations into Anput's machinations lead him directly to his own father's company. With the city facing ruin and the police powerless, Anput prepares for her final victory, but The Spider prepares to take the fight to her. Loyalties are tested and relationships fray, but The Spider will stop at nothing to seek justice. It's 22 pages of pulp action and mayhem with a contemporary flair!

In 1870, Tonto lies near death, as the Lone Ranger pleads with the Ute Indians for help from their Shaman. Three years prior, Tonto lived a relatively peaceful and happy life with his tribe. How did Tonto come to be a lone brave by the time he found John Reid near death in that desert chasm? The answer unfolds, as Tonto's happy life is shattered. Tonto fights for his life in the present, as he fights for his soul in the past. The Native Ground arc rolls toward its bloody climax in a heart-breaking tale of loss and revenge.
name: Native Ground, Part 2

description:
John Carter disappeared from Mars as mysteriously as he arrived. Days before he did, an unknown assassin murdered the guardian of the Red Planet's life support system. Carter himself is implicated in the horrific crime, and it's up to his princess, Dejah Thoris, to clear his name. That would be tough enough, but someone is trying to kill Dejah, too! With enemies all around her, both seen and unseen, she'll need all the help she can get. A murder mystery of Barsoomian proportions and more in the Warlord of Mars

A murder mystery of Barsoomian proportions and more in the Warlord of Mars Vol 2 TP! Collecting issues 10-18 of the series, along with a complete cover gallery!
name: Volume Two

description:
The original warrior of Mars comes to Dynamite! Warlord of Mars is an incredible enhancement of the classic Edgar Rice Burroughs story, Princess of Mars. If you thought you knew the story, think again! Featuring John Carter, an ex-cavalry officer in the Confederate Army who finds himself mysteriously transported to Mars, joined on his adventures by Tars Tarkas, his Martian comrade, and Dejah Thoris, a Martian Princess.

Collects the first 9-issues of the hit series, along with bonus material and a complete cover gallery featuring such great artists as Alex Ross, Joe Jusko, J. Scott Campbell, Lucio Parrillo, and more.
name: Volume One

description: It all comes together as Kelly, Skyler and Chelsea finally become the Ninjettes... and select their first kill! Guest-starring: Blood! Not Jennifer Blood, just gallon after stickily coagulating gallon of people's blood, all over the walls and the floor and the cat and even in your hair! SO MUCH BLOOD. YOU'LL NEVER BE CLEAN.
name: Everything We Like is Hard

description: The Ninjettes are dead -- long live the Ninjettes! After the apocalyptic events of Jennifer Blood #4, Kelly Hara is a headless corpse in a wooden box! But for how long? One dead cast member will make a shocking return from the grave in this issue, and we might just be shameless enough to make it her!
name: ...And Kill, and Maim, and Run Off Unpunished
La Sorcière aux Yeux Clairs / Les Yeux de Bois / La Colère du Ciel / Le Demon des Nuages / L'Appat Humain (30)
L'Herbe Miracle - Tous pour un ! … - Le Trésor de Rahan (34)
Le Coutelas Perdu - Le Spectre de Taroa (35)

description: "You will never lead a normal life again. For the rest of your days, you will be hunted by the forces of the most powerful country on the planet. We got the law and large numbers on our side and you can't kill us all!"

Our heroine is reunited with Sherman, everyone's favorite pedophile, and we get down and dirty with the simplistically exotic Penny and her dedication to the tube steak. As our mighty gang of misfits journey to find Judith's brother, who will fall? Are hillbillies taking over the world? Hold onto your butts, because issue 4 is a Hell ride of excitement and intrigue!

Long retired members of The Hypernaturals, Bewilder and Thinkwell, must assess the team’s ability to protect earth from the new, mysterious threat that has already decimated their most powerful members. Left with little to choose from but rookies and burn-outs, the Hypernaturals are running out of time… Dan Abnett and Andy Lanning, the superstar writing duo behind ANNIHILATION and THE LEGION, reunite with GUARDIANS OF THE GALAXY artist Brad Walker.

Lines are forming and fingers begin pointing as a clue to the identity of Elle's attacker is found. Friends and families are strained, and a mysterious figure lurks in the shadows, ready to make a game-changing move. Meanwhile, Elle's struggle to regain her memory finds her starting from the very first memory she has -- and it's a shocker!
name: Intimate Strangers, Part 3: Jane

description: Still on the run, Heidi and Rex land on the strangest, most dangerous planet yet. Filled with primordial creatures and the even deadlier battle tech of Higher Earth, Heidi and Rex are quickly running out of places to hide...

Rand Al'Thor was just trying to get a look at Logain without being noticed himself, and took a spill into a garden where he meets a young sister and brother - Elayne and Gawyn. After Elayne tends to Rand's wounds, he discovers that she is the daughter to the queen, and heir to the throne - not the most inconspicuous of moves on Rand's part. And when the palace guard discover him and bring him before the queen, what will happen then?

volume.name: Robert Jordan's Wheel of Time: The Eye of the World

description:
SPAWN'S 20th ANNIVERSARY CELEBRATION KICKS INTO HIGH GEAR! THE NEXT CHAPTER IN THE SECRET HISTORY OF JIM DOWNING! AND THE RETURN OF TREMOR!

SPAWN and Tremor join forces to uncover the secrets of the clandestine military project that made them both monsters. The history of the SPAWN universe and Jim's place within its vast mythology continues to unfold as new details and mysteries come to the forefront.
name: Origin Of The Species, Part 3

description:
The first of five issues that will CHANGE THE FACE OF X-FACTOR FOREVER.

PART I: A rejected Strong Guy does the unthinkable!
name: Breaking Points: Day 1

description: Two warring immortal races rule a scarred world where time has no meaning. Death (Azrael) sits impotent, quietly planning his restoration. He summons Monocyte, a forgotten immortal necromancer who long ago chose sleep in his failed quest to die. With a fatal pact sealed, Monocyte strikes out as Azrael's vicious proxy.
name: HC

description: Special Issue
name: Le Mini-Album de Rahan (378)

description:
Abyss has arrived! Can the newest Dialer – or anyone – stop him?

In a desperate attempt to save Manteau from X.N., Nelson is forced to team with his enemy.

Plus, the secrets of Squid revealed!
name: Into You

description:
What is the horrific secret behind “THE FORGOTTEN SUPERMAN”?

What happens when Superman is too late to save LOIS LANE?

And what is the staggering new threat The Man of Steel is about to face?

NOTE: the backup with Perry White mentioned in the original solicit is not contained.
name: Return of The Forgotten Superman

description:
MARTIAN MANHUNTER battles STORMWATCH!

A major turning point for the DC Universe as MARTIAN MANHUNTER quits STORMWATCH forever!

Don’t miss STORMWATCH this month in I, VAMPIRE!
name: Nefertiti's Bust
Bob Mallard et Puchon: Ciel en Folie

description: Mort and Phil will have to prove a series of inventions that Professor Bacterio designed to modernize the organization. Among the inventions designed to update the TIA include: a materializing of thought, a device to pass through the walls, a teleportation disks up and down, piles placed in the ear that you become invisible and a robot.
name: Va la TIA y se pone al dia

volume.name: Coleccion Ole de Mortadelo y Filemon

description: The T.I.A. has hired the prophet Jeremiah, the only prophet left alive. This will make predictions and Mort and Phil will have to avoid the mishaps that occur vaticinadas, something made ​​difficult by the fact that the prophet makes his predictions in a rather ambiguous (for example predicts that the TIA will blow up when that happens is that place an electric generator).
name: El profeta Jeremias

volume.name: Coleccion Ole de Mortadelo y Filemon

description:
This cartoon marks the end of the "black stage" Ibanez, increasing the quality of the drawing. Furthermore, from this story are re-edit the new adventures of the characters in hardcover in the series "Wizards of Humor".

Furthermore, this cartoon is the first in which it is a current topic customizing the protagonists of the same (eg Battle Juanito's character is a transcript of Juan Guerra) The press took note of the matter, giving publicity to the album, and Ibanez thereafter introduce current issues in comics.
name: El atasco de influencias

volume.name: Coleccion Ole de Mortadelo y Filemon

description:
A Chinese drug dealer named Ten-go-pee just came out of jail.

He wants revenge on the society that imprisoned him, and like in thirty years he did not level anything, make his fortune by Award No-Vel (an imitation of the Nobel Prizes).

It is aimed at offenders who commit the worst crimes, and to follow the parody of the Nobel, there is a No-vel of Medicine (for those who kill more people on the basis of adulterated drugs) or a No-vel of War parodying the Nobel Peace Prize (for those who cause more conflicts and wars) ....

Mort and Phil should capture Ten-go-pee.
name: El premio NO-VEL

volume.name: Coleccion Ole de Mortadelo y Filemon

description: Professor Bacterio trying to achieve a product that increases the power of things, but the invention fails and explodes, spreading a gas that makes everything work backwards. The lanterns shade instead of light, telephone kiosks spit the money instead of swallowing and even people behave for a short time as opposed to his normal personality. Taking advantage of the confusion of the moment a thief steals a tergiversicina aerosol. The mission of Mort and Phil will find the thief and recover the gas.
name: La tergiversicina

volume.name: Coleccion Ole de Mortadelo y Filemon

description: The year 1989 takes place against a backdrop of fall of dictatorships from Chile to Communist bloc countries, and the winds of democracy reach Chirimoyandia. Its ruler, General Gomez Chirimoyandia Obundio, establishes the Gomeztroika (parody of Gorbachev's Perestroika), but fears a conspiracy on the part of someone close. Thus asks the T.I.A. a couple of agents who infiltrated the ministries, to ensure the democratization of the country. And T.I.A. Mort and Phil commands.
name: La Gomeztroika

volume.name: Coleccion Ole de Mortadelo y Filemon

description:
A comic starring SuperTed, the bear with superpowers - and his best friend Spotty.

Sixteen page freebie edition featuring four comic strips plus photo features and puzzles - all relating to local landmarks and tourist attractions in the South West of England (mainly Weston-super-Mare).
name: Superted 1

description: Human traffickers. Rogue medical teams. Yakuza run organ mills and a six year-old drug fiend. Welcome to Dr. Benjamin Dane's nightmare. His only way out? Bring down the man who set him up by reclaiming organs already placed in some very powerful people. If Dexter, ER and 100 Bullets had a three-way and that mind blowing tryst somehow resulted in a kid, that kid would read HARVEST. Medical Grade Revenge.

You interested in the new Nocturnals series? You ever read the original story? No? Well, why not get all of it at once? This classic trade paperback collects the groundbreaking six-issue series published by Malibu Comics. Meet Doc Horror, Halloween Girl, Gunwitch, Firelion, Starfish, and the rest, as they battle gangsters, evil aliens, and the government that wants to destroy them. This fully painted story features brand-new pages, pin-ups, and an extensive gallery of Dan Brereton's sketchbook.
With murder in his heart, Shin takes off to shoot down Kanzaki, the man who betrayed him. But can he live with the consequences when he finds out Ryoko is on the plane he just fired upon?
Kanzaki joins forces with the mafia to have Shin assassinated! Meanwhile, Shin awaits judgement for firing upon Kanzaki's civilian jet liner!

Discover the secrets of Ryoko's father and his brush with death in World War II, when Ryoko recalls the day she first met Shin aboard her father's plane. Meanwhile, around the world, Invulnerable Charlie has returned to Area 88...this time to kill Shin!
Shin's actions may cost Saki his eyesight, and Shin discovers not only why Saki commands a mercenary air force, but the reason for the x-brand on his forehead. Aviation action ideal for new readers!
Crazy Charlie is back at Area 88 with a mission no one could ever imagine. And Charlie always succeeds!
With his new plane, Shin is safe in the sky. But can he survive the dangers of Area 88?
If the best pilots at Area 88 can't defend the base...then who can?
Captured by enemy forces, Mick is presented with a strange offer from Saki's brother, Rishar!

Shin sets off to discover the location and motives of the mysterious third force embroiled in the Asran civil war. But remote-control planes and guided missiles spell certain death for Area 88's number one pilot!

Hours of hope pass in vain for the soldiers of Area 88 waiting for Shin's return. But when word of Shin's death reaches Area 88, Mick launches himself into a blind frontal attack against the mysterious third army!
Shin's joyful prison reunion with Mick is cut short when a daring escape plan is beset by complications. Then in London, Saki and his bodyguard become victims of "A Howling in the Fog"!

A Mach 2 escape flight in two of Farina's robot planes has Shin and Mick anxiously awaiting their return to Area 88. All goes well until they discover the remote-activated self-destruct mechanisms within each plane! Will they make it, or will Farina discover their escape and blow them out of the sky? The answer awaits in "A Dark Cloud Over the Intrigue"!

Pandora faces the most unexpected foe yet- The biomechanical, war machine known as 'Shimmer.' But Shimmer isn't the only thing Pandora has to contend with, as the dark matter entity which she tracked to the nightmarish metal structure makes its presence known... In a very big way!

C’est Bon Anthology exposes the hidden things, the secret things. Apocrypha is an old Greek word that means “those having been hidden away”. And we all have dirty little things tucked away somewhere, don’t we? Whether they’re feelings we repress, unreflected actions, or guilty pleasures; they are the unknown factors that animate the mask we show to the world. Much like the 90% of an iceberg hidden below the waterline.

We are happy to give you with this anthology a look into the works and minds of artists that face their hidden baggage in so many different, surprising ways. A compilation of graphic short stories, an interview (“CBQ&A”) with a Finnish comics artist and a special guest (“Comics as Art – Art as Comics”); an artist from another branch within the visual arts.
name: Apocrypha

description:
‘The Chaos War’ continues! The Hulk faces his greatest enemy – the one foe he’s never been able to defeat – his own father!

By Greg Pak and Paul Pelletier

Also: The Red Hulk joins forces with the Hulk as they battle their way across Modok’s Monster Island!

By Audrey Loeb, Jeff Parker, Ben Oliver and Dario Brizulea.

Plus: The Watcher observes a terrible threat – and aims it at the Red Hulk!

By Jeff Parker, Ben Oliver, Gabriel Hardman.

Includes material reprinted from Inc Hulks #620 and Hulk #28-29.!

Wolverine and Spider-Man’s time-travel adventure comes to a mind-blowing conclusion as they clash with the interdimensional reality TV maniac called Mojo!

Also: Deadpool begins a new life in outer space – and gets hired to kill a planet!

Includes material reprinted from Astonishing Spider-Man & Wolverine #5-6 and Deadpool #33.

Cixi discovers she is pregnant by Thanos and tries for a abortion. Betrayed by one her maids Thanos prevents this and locks her up in his palace. Cixi is able to sneak out the palace during the night as the vigilante and joins forces with the oppostion. But what will she do about her pregnacy?
name: Le secret de Cixi (3ème partie)

description: Cixi decides to leave her pirate friends and introduces herself to Thanos. She quickly becomes Thanos mistress and leads a luxurious life by his side. However when she discovers the cruelty of Thanos' rule she turns into a vigilante by night.
name: Le secret de Cixi (2ème partie)

description: In this must-have for all Chibi Vampire fans, manga-ka Yuna Kagesaki takes you on a behind-the-scenes tour of the bestselling series, unveiling some never-before-seen artwork, pop quizzes, horoscopes, and much, much more.

volume.name: Richie Rich Best of the Years
